Martell Gourmet Passport
Discover a multi-sensorial gastronomic experience by pairing Martell Cordon Bleu with dishes made by Singapore’s biggest chefs. Travel to each booth to get a taste of each creation, designed to bring out the rich notes of this unique XO. Choose your favourite chef and dish to help us decide who is to become Martell’s Chef Ambassador.
If you haven’t signed up for your passport, register here <[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/SGN_BRD_Martell-Savour-event_Page---Registration.html]]>.
MASTER CLASSES AT L’ESPACE MARTELL
Watch as 3-Michelin Star Chef, Alvin Leung of Hong Kong’s Bo Innovation whips up some devilish delights such as his famed molecular xiao long bao. And, our Martell Global Ambassador, Jean-Jacques Regnault will be flying in from France to do a special cognac tasting for Savour.
Attend their Master Class 13 May – 14 May from 7:30 pm to 9:00pm.
